summary: For decades, federal agencies have made awards to fund research and development through the Small Business Innovation Research and Small Business Technology Transfer programs. In 2012, the Small Business Administration developed requirements to help agencies prevent fraud, waste, and abuse in the programs. However, we found that the 11 participating agencies have varied in their implementation of these fraud prevention requirements. We recommended that SBA...
title: Small Business Research Programs: Additional Actions Needed to Implement Fraud, Waste, and Abuse Prevention Requirements
